reviews.review_msg: Great TA. Fun and really helpful. Went above and beyond any TA i know to help students.
This class was great and relevant. She relates well to students and puts in a great effort to ensure they understand. Amazing proff.
Amazing help and always really nice.
Amazing Proff and TA. I sincerely enjoyed her. She went well above and beyond what is expected by a teacher.
The course was easy but she was very scattered. She tells you one thing and can mean the opposite. Don't recommend her.
Amazing help. She really got me through this course. Vary fair and understanding
REally helpful and responded to all questions quickly. She was extreamly fair too.
Very helpful. I feel students are being harsh here - she was extremely helpful but expected student to do their work and not be lazy. I thought she was awesome!!

Take long time marking assignments. Unclear reasonings on mark given. Typically respond to student's concern by telling them to call her during her office hour. Doesn't familiarize herself with the course content so ended up directing students on the wrong track. Overall, I hope SFU so hiring her as a TA!!!

She was the supervisor for this course and the TA. She was horrible! Kept making up excuses for why she can't get to sfu to let you see your exams. She works at St.Joseph hospital in downtown vancouver so if you want to see her or look over your exams, she'll tell you to find her there. The course was easy but don't bother counting on her to help!
She is the TM for the distance course and she is horrible. Has a huge attitude... get out of her class as soon as you know that she is the TM.
